snippet.title: Trailer DBZ Team Training (Pokémon hack)
snippet.description:
Warning to everyone!
Test the save at the start of the game. If it doesn't work, read carefully the description.
You need to save normally (not with save states) after beating the league, otherwise you'll be stuck.
I explained how to do at the bottom of the description.
You will find more information about patching and saving in this FAQ list: http://dragon-ball-z-team-training.wikia.com/wiki/Thread:3263.

This is a fan-made game, the original game is Pokemon Fire Red. All rights belong to Akira Toriyama, Toei Animation, Game Freak, Nintendo.

Download link of the latest update(V7): http://www.mediafire.com/file/9dlq353162qq7e8/V7.ips

This ips patch must be applied to the original game: Pokemon Fire Red 1.0. US version.
Make sure that it's the version 1.0., go to the FAQ list for more information.

Emulator(VBA): http://lb.cdn.m6web.fr/d/c/a/810dbbf2bc7c05fda104acfd7fd582e7/576db9d4/soft/logiciel/visualboyadvance_visualboyadvance_1.7.2_anglais_13616.zip

Thread (Pokecommunity): http://www.pokecommunity.com/showthread.php?t=356222

Wikia: http://dragon-ball-z-team-training.wikia.com/wiki/Dragon_Ball_Z_Team_Training_Wikia

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Dragon-Ball-Z-Team-Training-621603401312722/timeline/?ref=hl


I'm Z-Max (Maxime F. for people who know me).
I've made this game from Pokémon Fire Red. It's a hack in which you can create your own team
with the characters of Dragon Ball Z.

The title is basic, I didn't look for a specific title...
Actually, I just wanted to have fun by making this game.

Here are the main modifications:
-Pokemons are replaced by "fighters". There are 147 fighters.

-There are 167 attacks including 137 new attacks (techniques from Dbz)
with new animations of course, and 30 old attacks (from Pokémon, like Headbutt for example).

-I added new maps for some cities. I didn't change all the maps, only some of them.

-I've changed some overworld sprites too. (mini-sprites on the maps)

-Many items were added. (capsules, senzu...etc) The list is in the thread.


Maybe this is not the perfect game but I've made it alone. It took me many time to do it, then there can be some defects.

I don't speak english perfectly, so I did my best but the texts may be wrong sometimes.
The Trainer Tower is not modified, I need more time to change 
the trainers. (But it doesn't matter very much)
There is also a little problem with the attack animations during dual battles, so don't be surprised if some attacks are weird in a dual battle.

I tested the game and it works without any problem. There are only some glitches but I'm going to fix it later.

The save:
It's the same problem with the other pokemon games. You have to adjust the settings on VBA.
Go to "options" ; "emulator" ; "save type" and choose Automatic and Flash 128K. Then, put the files (emulator and rom) in the same folder. There must not be a save file (".sav") in the folder before opening the rom.
Then you should be able to save. You can search on Google too if you can't do it.

If you're on Android: Use the emulator Myboy Free and go to Settings, advanced, cartridge type and choose 128. The save should work like that.
You can also watch this tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zV-KmED_XR8

Another thing: download Type Resistance Editor if you want to change the type advantages: http://www.mediafire.com/download/341bbeouc2c9eyj/TypeResistanceEditor_for_DBZ_TT.exe

If you want more information, go to the thread on Pokecommunity.
on the wikia managed by PureRage,  or on the facebook page. (links at the top)

Now, just enjoy ;)

The music on this video is a cover of "Fight Theme" by Diego Ariel Miranda.
